quotes.quote: I've been using Only Insurance Leads for about 10 years now. To get a feel for the results, I started out at 2,000 letters a month and now I do 18,000 letters a month. The results are consistent, and Only Insurance Leads are now my one and only marketing program. You send them an email anytime day or night and they respond right away. Fantastic results and excellent service!!

Shana,
Thank you so much for your services over the last several years. Your monthly letter was a big help to my agency.
Your service is unmatched. You are truly appreciated.

If you are looking for something that works better than online pay-per-click, get these exclusive local leads from the powerful Only Insurance Leads marketing program. Shana and her team are first class!
quotes.company: Morgan Hege Insurance Agency LLC, California

quotes.quote: Only Insurance Leads is like no other lead company I have ever used. They do what they say when they say they will. The best part is that it really works.
quotes.company: Jim Kelly Allstate Insurance Agency, California

quotes.quote: Best marketing program I have used in the 20+ years of being a district manager. My agents love it!
I have purchased leads in the past where I'm quoting against multiple agents. Only Insurance Leads allows me to be in front of multiple clients a day and be the only agent quoting their property!
We achieved a break-even ROI on our first mailer after only three phone calls!
quotes.company: Morgan Hege Insurance Agency LLC, California

quotes.quote: I have been using Only Insurance Leads for almost 3 years now.  Sales from their direct mailers account for 34% of my entire book of business.  Needless to say, my partnership with OIL has been a huge success.

I am very pleased with the service and results I have received from using Only Insurance Leads. With all of the expensive low quality systems that I have tried over several years, this has been a consistent and effective tool for growing my agency.
Iâ€™ve been using Only Insurance Leads since 2007. Hands down, it has been the most consistent, successful marketing program I have ever used.
The carriers want to know what my secret is ... But I'm not telling! Thanks Shana!
quotes.company: Morgan Hege Insurance Agency LLC, California

quotes.quote: I have been using Only Insurance Leads for almost 2 years now and it is consistently my number one source for generating new business. It is the fastest, easiest and most effective way to bring new clients into my agency.
Our mailers through Only Insurance Leads are a vital part of our agency success. Every time that we increase our quantity of mailings our quote volume goes up - Only Insurance Leads is a no brainer!

I've been using Only Insurance Leads (OIL) for over two years for homeowner's direct mailings.  In an era with DNC and Caller Id, telemarketing is less effective.  When my monthly mailings go out, I get 4-6 prospects calling the agency directly.

I am fairly new to Direct Mail Leads and so far am very pleased with the process and the account representative. Shana has been very helpful with my many questions. We both have a goal toward success. I do recommend joining this company.
Only Insurance Leads have helped me grow my scratch agency consistently! They have been great to work with and through the mailers I have been able to earn quality business!
We have had great success since partnering with Only Insurance Leads. High quality mailer, great call-in rate, and easy to work with. Have many agents in my area asking what our secret is.

My team has been using Only Insurance Leads for about 3 years. Within just a few months, we saw an immediate increase in call volume which resulted in more activity and sales. Shana has been phenomenal to work with and is very attentive to our needs. I recommend them to all of my agents!
